Step 1 of 3 – Getting Started

Let's get started. We just need a few details from you. Your information is kept confidential according to CPA standards and is needed to determine if you qualify for these substantial tax rebates and government incentives.

Step 2 of 3 – Company Info

Step 3 of 3 – Taxes & Payroll

What do you usually pay in annual taxes?*
Does your company or its partners have 80% or more ownership in any other businesses?*
Have you qualified for and claimed any federal government incentives or tax credits within the past three years?*
At any point in time during 2020 or 2021 did you utilize a PEO (professional employer organization) as your payroll provider?*
Pertaining to the partners in your company, other than their spouse, are there any immeditate family members (i.e children, siblings, parents) on payroll?*
